nodes.name: Emperor of Earth
nodes.role: Ruler of a lost human fragment
nodes.description: The leader of Earth whose armies have conquered the galaxy in a Great Crusade.

nodes.name: HORUS AXIMAND
nodes.description: First among the primarchs, known as the Brightest Star and the favorite son of the Emperor.

nodes.name: ROGAL DORN
nodes.description: The genetic father and leader of the Imperial Fists Legion.

nodes.name: SANGUINIUS
nodes.description: The genetic father and leader of the Blood Angels Legion.

nodes.name: EZEKYLE ABADDON
nodes.description: A high-ranking and proud officer of the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: TARIK TORGADDON
nodes.description: A joker and man of mighty laughter among the Luna Wolves' leadership.

nodes.name: IACTON QRUZE
nodes.description: A veteran captain known as 'The Half-heard'.

nodes.name: HASTUR SEJANUS
nodes.description: A beautiful and noble warrior-diplomat who was the Warmaster's favorite son.

nodes.name: SERGHAR TARGOST
nodes.description: A captain who also oversees the Legion's internal lodges.

nodes.name: GARVIEL LOKEN
nodes.description: A principled captain and the main storyteller regarding the compliance of Sixty-Three Nineteen.

nodes.name: LUC SEDIRAE
nodes.description: A ruthless captain described as having less diplomatic temperance than Sejanus.

nodes.name: TYBALT MARR
nodes.description: Known as 'The Either', a captain in the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: VERULAM MOY
nodes.description: Known as 'The Or', partner to Tybalt Marr.

nodes.name: LEV GOSHEN
nodes.description: A high-ranking officer of the Luna Wolves.

nodes.name: KALUS EKADDON
nodes.description: Leader of the specialized Catulan Reaver assault unit.

nodes.name: FALKUS KIBRE
nodes.description: Known as 'Widowmaker', leader of the elite Justaerin elite guard.

nodes.name: NERO VIPUS
nodes.description: A veteran sergeant in the 10th Company.

nodes.name: XAVYER JUBAL
nodes.description: A sergeant in the Luna Wolves Legion.

nodes.name: MALOGHURST
nodes.description: Known as 'The Twisted', he is Horus's primary advisor and personal assistant.

nodes.name: MATHANUAL AUGUST
nodes.description: The commander of the 140th Expedition fleet's naval forces.

nodes.name: KYRIL SINDERMANN
nodes.description: A senior propagandist and teacher responsible for spreading Imperial truth.

nodes.name: IGNACE KARKASY
nodes.description: A poet assigned to record the Great Crusade for posterity.

nodes.name: MERSADIE OLITON
nodes.description: A documentarist tasked with visually and textually recording History.

nodes.name: EUPHRATI KEELER
nodes.description: A photographer or 'imagist' capturing the Crusade in pictures.

nodes.name: PEETER EGON MOMUS
nodes.description: An architect involved in the design of Imperial structures.

nodes.name: AENID RATHBONE
nodes.description: A high-level official of the Imperial Administration.

nodes.name: JEPHTA NAUD
nodes.description: A leader of the military forces of the interex civilization.

nodes.name: DIATH SHEHN
nodes.description: A high ranking official or priest within the interex society.

nodes.name: ASHEROT
nodes.description: A non-human official serving the interex.

nodes.name: MITHRAS TULL
nodes.description: A secondary military leader in the interex armies.

nodes.name: EREBUS
nodes.description: A high-ranking spiritual advisor and warrior of the Word Bearers Legion.

nodes.name: SIGISMUND
nodes.description: The premier captain of the Imperial Fists Legion.

nodes.name: EIDOLON
nodes.description: A high commander of the Emperor's Children Legion.

nodes.name: LUCIUS
nodes.description: A captain in the Emperor's Children Legion.

nodes.name: SAUL TARVITZ
nodes.description: A captain in the Emperor's Children Legion.

nodes.name: RALDORON
nodes.description: The master of a major division within the Blood Angels Legion.

nodes.name: BOAS COMNENUS
nodes.description: The overall naval commander of the 63rd Expedition.

nodes.name: HEKTOR VARVARUS
nodes.description: The commander of the non-Marine human infantry forces in the 63rd Expedition.

nodes.name: ING MAE SING
nodes.description: The leader of the telepathic communication corps for the fleet.

nodes.name: ERFA HINE SWEQ CHOROGUS
nodes.description: Representing the Navigator families who guide ships through the warp.

nodes.name: REGULUS
nodes.description: A representative from the industrial and technological priesthood of Mars.

nodes.name: Koestler
nodes.description: A historical figure from the early days of the Crusade, credited with observing the growth of myths.

nodes.name: Lorgar
nodes.description: The Primarch who mused on the difference between gods and daemons.

nodes.name: Sahlonum
nodes.description: An ancient philosopher who questioned the limits of science versus sorcery.

nodes.name: Dymos
nodes.description: A member of Sejanus's 'glory squad' who was slaughtered at the local Emperor's palace.

nodes.name: Malsandar
nodes.description: A member of Sejanus's 'glory squad' who was murdered alongside his captain.

nodes.name: Gorthoi
nodes.description: A member of Sejanus's elite squad who fell during the failed diplomatic audience.

edges.description: Torgaddon is a joker and comrade who often cajoles Loken into retelling his favorite ironic story about the death of the Emperor.
Sejanus is compared to Abaddon, possessing a martial record second only to the First Captain, though Sejanus is considered less proud and irascible.
Sejanus is contrasted with Sedirae, being noted as far less ruthless than the 13th Company captain.
Sejanus is contrasted with Iacton Qruze, who is described as more solid and venerable than the younger captains.
